cause.description:
What we/you need to do is save and help poor children in need; we need you and other people who can help stop world hunger. Do want to see poor and helpless children on the streets, dieing, and possibly starving to death...No!!! We need to stop world hunger so people can have a life and be free without stravation... YOU CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE!!! :)
1. Help poor children
2. travel to poor countries like: Africa and give our donations
3. Start a food drive
cause.name: Stop World Hunger
